name: Noughts, Crosses, And Dicks
description:
I was drunk and curious if I could still program while under the influence, seems I can to some degree although the code probably sucks lol

It's really nothing special, it's just noughts and crosses but it has 3 players. It sucks to be honest. Features cool voice acting from me tho

I was going to make an android build but I don't have a phone currently and wouldn't be able to test it so you don't get an android build sorry

I've included the entire project's source as a download, it should just be a case of opening it up in godot (although I'm not sure) - just be careful, the code may be ghastly (idk) and does not have a single comment

I didn't include the font in the source files so you'll have to pry it out of my cold, dead hands (extract from the game exports), this is because I like the font but it's mine so I'm keeping it all rights reserved (for n ow)
